_header: If ye will wit the property
_description: A Morality of Wisdom — 1168 lines in 8-line stanzas

BodDig133.First Lines:
If ye wyll wete the propyrteAnd the resoun of my name
                    Imperiall…
BodDig133.Last Lines:
…of the comon thei synge eche weke by & bythei may sey
                    with tynker I trowe late Amende
